content.overview: 插入排序是一种基础的排序算法.
content.pseudo_code:
1. for j = 2 to A.length
    2.     key = A[j]
    3.     # insert A[j] into the sorted sequence A[1, ..., j-1]
    4.     i = j - 1
    5.     while i > 0 and A[i] > key:
    6.         A[i + 1] = A[i]
    7.         i = i - 1
    8.     A[i + 1] = key
